vstore.framework.context

Class ContextAggregator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • vstore.framework.context.ContextAggregator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ContextAggregator
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class saves new context information to the context file as it arrives.

    • Method Detail

      • storeLocationContext

        public static void storeLocationContext(VLocation location)

      • storeActivityContext

        public static void storeActivityContext(VActivity activity)
        Updates the activity context. If the given one is a different type, we update the value used by the framework. If the type is still the same, we only update the timestamp to reflect the duration this activity is already given.
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity context.

      • storeNetworkContext

        public static void storeNetworkContext(VNetwork net)
        Updates the network context in the shared pref to the given one.
        Parameters:
        net - The VNetwork context object to store in the framework.

      • storeNoiseContext

        public static void storeNoiseContext(VNoise noise)
        Updates the noise context in the shared pref to the given one.
        Parameters:
        noise - The VNoise context object to store in the framework.
